entries.title: Pancakes
entries.description: Fluffy pancakes with syrup
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup all-purpose flour
- 2 tablespoons sugar
- 1 tablespoon baking powder
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup milk
- 1 egg
- 2 tablespoons melted butter

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
2. In another bowl, whisk together the milk, egg, and melted butter.
3. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until combined.
4. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease it.
5. Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake.
6. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
7. Serve with syrup and enjoy!

entries.title: Omelette
entries.description: Classic omelette with cheese and vegetables
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 3 eggs
- 1/4 cup milk
- 1/4 cup grated cheese
- 1/4 cup diced bell peppers
- 1/4 cup diced onions
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, whisk the eggs and milk together.
2. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease it.
3. Pour the egg mixture into the skillet.
4. As the eggs start to set, sprinkle the cheese, bell peppers, and onions over one half of the omelette.
5. Fold the other half over the filling and cook for another 1-2 minutes.
6. Slide the omelette onto a plate, season with salt and pepper, and serve.

entries.title: Smoothie Bowl
entries.description: Healthy smoothie bowl with fruits and granola
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 banana
- 1/2 cup frozen berries
- 1/2 cup yogurt
- 1/4 cup milk
- 1/4 cup granola
- Sliced fruits for topping

Instructions:
1. In a blender, combine the banana, frozen berries, yogurt, and milk. Blend until smooth.
2. Pour the smoothie into a bowl.
3. Top with granola and sliced fruits of your choice.
4. Serve immediately and enjoy a refreshing breakfast!

entries.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
entries.description: Classic Caesar salad with grilled chicken
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 2 chicken breasts
- 1 head romaine lettuce
- 1/4 cup Caesar dressing
- 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/4 cup croutons
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
2. Grill the chicken until fully cooked, then slice it into strips.
3. Chop the romaine lettuce and place it in a large bowl.
4. Add the Caesar dressing and toss to coat the lettuce evenly.
5. Top the salad with grilled chicken, Parmesan cheese, and croutons.
6. Serve immediately and enjoy a healthy lunch!

entries.title: Turkey Sandwich
entries.description: Classic turkey sandwich with lettuce and tomato
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 2 slices of whole wheat bread
- 4 slices of turkey breast
- 1 slice of cheese
- Lettuce leaves
- Tomato slices
- Mayonnaise and mustard

Instructions:
1. Spread mayonnaise and mustard on one side of each slice of bread.
2. Layer the turkey, cheese, lettuce, and tomato on one slice of bread.
3. Place the other slice of bread on top to form a sandwich.
4. Cut the sandwich in half and serve with chips or a side salad.

entries.title: Quinoa Salad
entries.description: Refreshing quinoa salad with veggies and feta
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup cooked quinoa
- 1/4 cup diced cucumber
- 1/4 cup diced tomatoes
- 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, cucumber, tomatoes, and feta cheese.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
3. Pour the dressing over the quinoa salad and toss to coat.
4. Serve immediately or chill in the fridge before serving.

entries.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
entries.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 200g spaghetti
- 1/2 pound ground beef
- 1 small onion, diced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 can (15 oz) tomato sauce
- 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- Salt, pepper, and Italian herbs to taste

Instructions:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat.
3. Add the diced onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is translucent.
4. Stir in the tomato sauce and season with salt, pepper, and Italian herbs.
5. Simmer the sauce for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Serve the sauce over the spaghetti and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

entries.title: Grilled Salmon
entries.description: Perfectly grilled salmon with lemon butter sauce
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 2 salmon fillets
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice
- 1 tablespoon butter
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh herbs for garnish

Instructions:
1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. Brush the salmon fillets with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
3. Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked.
4. In a small saucepan, melt the butter and stir in the lemon juice.
5. Drizzle the lemon butter sauce over the grilled salmon.
6. Garnish with fresh herbs and serve with a side of vegetables.

entries.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
entries.description: Quick and easy stir-fried chicken with vegetables
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 2 chicken breasts, sliced
- 1 bell pepper, sliced
- 1 onion, sliced
- 1/4 cup soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 1 tablespoon cornstarch
- 2 tablespoons water
- Cooked rice, for serving

Instructions:
1. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
2. Add the sliced chicken and cook until browned and cooked through.
3. Add the bell pepper and onion, and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until tender.
4. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, cornstarch, and water to make a sauce.
5. Pour the sauce over the stir-fry and cook for another 2 minutes until thickened.
6. Serve the stir-fry over cooked rice and enjoy.

entries.title: Avocado Toast
entries.description: Creamy avocado on whole-grain toast with a poached egg
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 ripe avocado
- 2 slices of whole-grain bread
- 1 egg
- Salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes to taste

Instructions:
1. Toast the bread slices to your desired level of crispiness.
2. Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
3. Spread the mashed avocado evenly on each slice of toast.
4. Poach the egg in simmering water for 3-4 minutes.
5. Place the poached egg on top of the avocado toast.
6. Serve immediately and enjoy!

entries.title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
entries.description: Layers of Greek yogurt, fresh berries, and granola
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup Greek yogurt
- 1/2 cup mixed fresh berries
- 1/4 cup granola
- 1 tablespoon honey (optional)

Instructions:
1. In a glass or bowl, layer half of the Greek yogurt.
2. Add a layer of mixed berries.
3. Sprinkle granola over the berries.
4. Repeat the layers with the remaining ingredients.
5. Drizzle honey on top if desired.
6. Serve immediately and enjoy a healthy breakfast!

entries.title: Breakfast Burrito
entries.description: Hearty burrito with scrambled eggs, bacon, and cheese
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 2 large eggs
- 2 slices of bacon
- 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese
- 1/4 cup diced tomatoes
- 1 tortilla
- Salsa, for serving

Instructions:
1. Cook the bacon in a skillet until crispy, then crumble it.
2. In a bowl, whisk the eggs and cook them in the skillet until scrambled.
3. Warm the tortilla in a separate skillet.
4. Place the scrambled eggs, crumbled bacon, shredded cheese, and diced tomatoes in the center of the tortilla.
5. Fold the tortilla into a burrito and serve with salsa.

entries.title: Veggie Frittata
entries.description: Healthy frittata with spinach, mushrooms, and feta
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 4 large eggs
- 1/2 cup chopped spinach
- 1/4 cup sliced mushrooms
- 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In an oven-safe skillet, sauté the mushrooms and spinach until softened.
3. In a bowl, whisk the eggs and season with salt and pepper.
4. Pour the eggs over the sautéed vegetables and cook for 2 minutes.
5. Sprinkle feta cheese on top and transfer the skillet to the oven.
6. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the frittata is set.
7. Slice and serve.

entries.title: French Toast
entries.description: Classic French toast with a hint of cinnamon
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 2 slices of thick bread
- 2 large eggs
- 1/4 cup milk
- 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1 tablespoon butter
- Maple syrup, for serving

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and cinnamon.
2. Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides.
3. Heat a skillet over medium heat and melt the butter.
4. Cook the bread slices in the skillet for 2-3 minutes per side, until golden brown.
5. Serve the French toast with maple syrup and enjoy.

entries.title: Chia Pudding
entries.description: Creamy chia pudding with almond milk and fresh berries
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1/4 cup chia seeds
- 1 cup almond milk
- 1 tablespoon honey or maple syrup
- 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
- Fresh berries for topping

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, combine the chia seeds, almond milk, honey or maple syrup, and vanilla extract.
2. Stir well to mix, then cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
3. Stir the pudding before serving.
4. Top with fresh berries and enjoy a healthy and refreshing breakfast!

entries.title: Breakfast Quesadilla
entries.description: Quesadilla stuffed with scrambled eggs, cheese, and sausage
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 2 large eggs
- 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese
- 2 sausage links, cooked and sliced
- 1 large tortilla
- Salsa, for serving

Instructions:
1. Scramble the eggs in a skillet over medium heat.
2. Place the tortilla in a separate skillet and sprinkle half of the cheese on one side.
3. Add the scrambled eggs and sausage slices on top of the cheese.
4. Sprinkle the remaining cheese over the filling.
5. Fold the tortilla in half and cook until golden brown on both sides.
6. Serve with salsa.

entries.title: Oatmeal with Nuts and Fruits
entries.description: Warm oatmeal topped with nuts, fruits, and honey
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup rolled oats
- 1 cup water or milk
- 1/4 cup mixed nuts
- 1/4 cup fresh or dried fruits
- 1 tablespoon honey

Instructions:
1. In a small saucepan, bring the water or milk to a boil.
2. Add the oats and reduce heat to a simmer. Cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
3. Remove from heat and transfer the oatmeal to a bowl.
4. Top with mixed nuts, fruits, and honey.
5. Serve warm and enjoy a healthy and filling breakfast.

entries.title: Biscuits and Gravy
entries.description: Flaky biscuits with creamy sausage gravy
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 4 large biscuits (store-bought or homemade)
- 1/2 pound breakfast sausage
- 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
- 1 cup milk
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Bake the biscuits according to package instructions or prepare homemade biscuits.
2. In a skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned.
3. Sprinkle the flour over the sausage and stir to combine.
4. Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly, until the gravy thickens.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the sausage gravy over the biscuits.

entries.title: Grilled Veggie Wrap
entries.description: Grilled vegetables with hummus in a whole wheat wrap
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 whole wheat wrap
- 1/2 cup grilled zucchini
- 1/2 cup grilled bell peppers
- 1/4 cup grilled onions
- 2 tablespoons hummus

Instructions:
1. Spread the hummus evenly over the whole wheat wrap.
2. Arrange the grilled vegetables on top of the hummus.
3. Roll up the wrap tightly and cut in half.
4. Serve with a side of mixed greens.

entries.title: Chicken Avocado Salad
entries.description: Fresh salad with grilled chicken, avocado, and a light vinaigrette
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 grilled chicken breast, sliced
- 1 avocado, diced
- 4 cups mixed greens
- 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the mixed greens, avocado, and cherry tomatoes.
2. Top with the sliced grilled chicken.
3. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, and season with salt and pepper.
4. Toss gently to combine and serve immediately.

entries.title: Beef Burrito
entries.description: Hearty burrito filled with seasoned beef, beans, and cheese
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 large flour tortilla
- 1/2 cup seasoned ground beef
- 1/4 cup black beans
- 1/4 cup shredded cheese
- 1/4 cup salsa
- 1/4 cup diced tomatoes
- Sour cream and guacamole for serving

Instructions:
1. Warm the flour tortilla in a skillet or microwave.
2. Place the seasoned beef, black beans, shredded cheese, salsa, and diced tomatoes in the center of the tortilla.
3. Fold the sides of the tortilla over the filling and roll it up.
4. Serve with sour cream and guacamole on the side.

entries.title: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
entries.description: Nourishing bowl with quinoa, black beans, and avocado
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup cooked quinoa
- 1/2 cup black beans
- 1/4 cup corn kernels
- 1/4 avocado, sliced
- 2 tablespoons salsa
- 1 tablespoon lime juice

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, layer the cooked quinoa, black beans, and corn.
2. Top with avocado slices.
3. Drizzle with salsa and lime juice.
4. Serve immediately for a healthy, balanced meal.

entries.title: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
entries.description: Tender pulled pork in a tangy BBQ sauce on a soft bun
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 soft hamburger bun
- 1/2 cup pulled pork
- 1/4 cup BBQ sauce
- 1/4 cup coleslaw

Instructions:
1. Heat the pulled pork and mix it with the BBQ sauce.
2. Pile the pulled pork onto the bottom half of the hamburger bun.
3. Top with coleslaw and place the other half of the bun on top.
4. Serve with a side of potato chips or pickles.

entries.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
entries.description: Healthy salad with chickpeas, cucumber, and feta cheese
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup cooked chickpeas
- 1/2 cup diced cucumber
- 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 2 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, cucumber, and cherry tomatoes.
2. Add the crumbled feta cheese.
3. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper.
4. Toss gently to combine and serve.

entries.title: Grilled Cheese and Tomato Soup
entries.description: Classic grilled cheese sandwich with a side of tomato soup
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 2 slices of white bread
- 2 slices of cheddar cheese
- 1 tablespoon butter
- 1 cup tomato soup

Instructions:
1. Heat a skillet over medium heat and melt the butter.
2. Place the cheese slices between the bread slices.
3. Grill the sandwich in the skillet until the bread is golden and the cheese is melted.
4. Serve with a warm bowl of tomato soup.

entries.title: Turkey and Avocado Club
entries.description: Hearty club sandwich with turkey, avocado, and bacon
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 3 slices of whole wheat bread
- 4 slices of turkey breast
- 2 slices of bacon, cooked
- 1/4 avocado, sliced
- Lettuce and tomato slices
- Mayonnaise

Instructions:
1. Spread mayonnaise on one side of each slice of bread.
2. Layer the turkey, bacon, avocado, lettuce, and tomato between the slices of bread to form a triple-decker sandwich.
3. Cut the sandwich into quarters and secure with toothpicks.
4. Serve with a side of fries or a pickle.

entries.title: Lemon Herb Grilled Salmon
entries.description: Grilled salmon fillet with lemon and fresh herbs
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 salmon fillet
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice
- 1 teaspoon chopped fresh dill
- 1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. Brush the salmon fillet with olive oil and lemon juice.
3. Season with dill, parsley, salt, and pepper.
4. Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes on each side until cooked through.
5. Serve with a side of steamed vegetables or a fresh salad.

entries.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
entries.description: Quick and healthy stir-fried vegetables with tofu
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots)
- 1/2 cup tofu, cubed
- 1 tablespoon soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 1 teaspoon ginger, minced

Instructions:
1. Heat sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat.
2. Add garlic and ginger, and sauté for 1 minute.
3. Add the mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until tender.
4. Add the tofu and soy sauce, and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes.
5. Serve over steamed rice or noodles.

entries.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
entries.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with pancetta, egg, and cheese
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 8 oz spaghetti
- 2 eggs
- 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 4 oz pancetta, diced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
2. In a skillet, cook the pancetta over medium heat until crispy.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
4. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and Parmesan cheese.
5. Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the pancetta.
6. Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture until creamy.
7. Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.

entries.title: Chicken Alfredo
entries.description: Creamy pasta with grilled chicken and Parmesan cheese
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 8 oz fettuccine
- 1 cup heavy cream
- 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1 grilled chicken breast, sliced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon butter
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Cook the fettuccine according to package instructions.
2. In a skillet, melt the butter and sauté the garlic until fragrant.
3. Add the heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
4. Stir in the Parmesan cheese until the sauce thickens.
5. Add the sliced grilled chicken to the sauce.
6. Toss the cooked fettuccine in the sauce and season with salt and pepper.
7. Serve with additional Parmesan cheese on top.

entries.title: Beef Stir-Fry with Rice
entries.description: Savory stir-fried beef with vegetables over rice
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 8 oz beef sirloin, thinly sliced
- 1 cup mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, snap peas)
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon oyster sauce
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
- Cooked rice for serving

Instructions:
1. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
2. Add the garlic and stir-fry for 1 minute.
3. Add the beef and stir-fry until browned, about 3 minutes.
4. Add the mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until tender.
5. Stir in the soy sauce and oyster sauce, and cook for another 2 minutes.
6. Serve the beef stir-fry over cooked rice.

entries.title: Roast Chicken with Vegetables
entries.description: Classic roast chicken with roasted potatoes and carrots
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 whole chicken
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 tablespoon rosemary, chopped
- 1 tablespoon thyme, chopped
- 4 potatoes, quartered
- 4 carrots, cut into large pieces
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Rub the chicken with olive oil, rosemary, thyme, salt, and pepper.
3. Place the chicken in a roasting pan.
4. Arrange the potatoes and carrots around the chicken.
5. Roast for 1 hour and 20 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked.
6. Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving.
7. Serve with the roasted vegetables.

entries.title: Vegetable Lasagna
entries.description: Layers of pasta, vegetables, and cheese baked to perfection
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 12 lasagna noodles
- 2 cups ricotta cheese
- 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
- 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 2 cups marinara sauce
- 1 zucchini, sliced
- 1 bell pepper, sliced
- 1/2 cup spinach
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cook the lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
3. In a skillet, heat olive oil and sauté the garlic until fragrant.
4. Add the zucchini, bell pepper, and spinach, and cook until tender.
5. In a baking dish, spread a layer of marinara sauce.
6. Layer with lasagna noodles, ricotta cheese, sautéed vegetables, and mozzarella cheese.
7. Repeat the layers, ending with a layer of marinara sauce and Parmesan cheese on top.
8. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes.
9. Remove the foil and bake for another 10 minutes until the cheese is bubbly.

entries.title: Steak and Mashed Potatoes
entries.description: Juicy steak served with creamy mashed potatoes
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 8 oz steak (ribeye or sirloin)
- 2 large potatoes, peeled and diced
- 1/4 cup milk
- 2 tablespoons butter
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 tablespoon olive oil

Instructions:
1. Preheat a skillet over medium-high heat and add olive oil.
2. Season the steak with salt and pepper, and cook to your desired doneness (about 4-5 minutes per side for medium).
3. While the steak is cooking, boil the diced potatoes until tender.
4. Drain the potatoes and mash them with milk, butter, salt, and pepper.
5. Serve the steak with a side of mashed potatoes.

entries.title: Mixed Berry Parfait
entries.description: Layers of fresh berries, Greek yogurt, and granola
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries)
- 1 cup Greek yogurt
- 1/2 cup granola
- 1 tablespoon honey (optional)

Instructions:
1. In a glass or bowl, layer Greek yogurt, mixed berries, and granola.
2. Repeat the layers until all ingredients are used.
3. Drizzle with honey if desired.
4. Serve immediately.

entries.title: Fruit Salad with Mint
entries.description: Refreshing fruit salad with a hint of mint
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup diced pineapple
- 1 cup diced watermelon
- 1 cup diced mango
- 1 cup sliced strawberries
- 2 tablespoons fresh mint, chopped
- 1 tablespoon lime juice

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the pineapple, watermelon, mango, and strawberries.
2. Add the chopped mint and lime juice.
3. Toss everything together until well mixed.
4. Serve chilled.

entries.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
entries.description: Classic chewy chocolate chip cookies
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup butter, softened
- 1 cup sugar
- 1 cup brown sugar
- 2 eggs
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
- 3 cups flour
- 1 teaspoon baking soda
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 2 cups chocolate chips

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
3. Beat in the eggs and vanilla extract.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until combined.
6. Stir in the chocolate chips.
7. Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden brown.

entries.title: Vanilla Cupcakes with Buttercream Frosting
entries.description: Light and fluffy vanilla cupcakes topped with creamy buttercream
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 cups flour
- 1 teaspoon baking powder
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 1/2 cup butter, softened
- 1 cup sugar
- 2 eggs
- 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
- 1/2 cup milk

Buttercream Frosting:
- 1/2 cup butter, softened
- 2 cups powdered sugar
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
- 2 tablespoons milk

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a cupcake pan with paper liners.
2. In a bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
4. Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, alternating with milk.
6. Fill the cupcake liners 2/3 full with batter.
7. Bake for 18-20 minutes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. For the frosting, beat the butter until creamy, then gradually add the powdered sugar.
9. Mix in the vanilla extract and milk until smooth and fluffy.
10. Frost the cooled cupcakes.

entries.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
entries.description: Rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten center
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1/2 cup butter
- 4 oz dark chocolate
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 2 eggs
- 2 egg yolks
- 1/4 cup flour
- 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C) and grease ramekins.
2. Melt the butter and chocolate together in a microwave or double boiler.
3. Stir in the sugar until smooth.
4. Add the eggs and egg yolks, and whisk until well combined.
5. Stir in the flour and vanilla extract until smooth.
6. Divide the batter evenly among the ramekins.
7. Bake for 12-14 minutes until the edges are set but the center is still soft.
8. Let the cakes cool for 1 minute before turning them out onto plates.
9. Serve immediately with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

entries.title: Cheesecake
entries.description: Creamy and rich classic cheesecake with a graham cracker crust
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 cups graham cracker crumbs
- 1/4 cup sugar
- 1/2 cup butter, melted
- 3 packages (8 oz each) cream cheese, softened
- 1 cup sugar
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
- 3 eggs

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C).
2. Combine the graham cracker crumbs, 1/4 cup sugar, and melted butter.
3. Press the mixture into the bottom of a springform pan.
4. In a large bowl, beat the cream cheese, 1 cup sugar, and vanilla extract until smooth.
5. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
6. Pour the batter over the crust.
7. Bake for 55-60 minutes until the center is almost set.
8. Let the cheesecake cool before refrigerating for at least 4 hours before serving.

entries.title: Apple Crumble
entries.description: Warm apple dessert with a crumbly oat topping
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 4 apples, peeled and sliced
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice
- 1 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1/2 cup flour
- 1/2 cup rolled oats
- 1/2 cup brown sugar
- 1/4 cup butter, melted

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a bowl, toss the apple slices with sugar, lemon juice, and cinnamon.
3. Transfer the apple mixture to a baking dish.
4. In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, oats, and brown sugar.
5. Stir in the melted butter until the mixture is crumbly.
6. Sprinkle the crumble topping over the apples.
7. Bake for 35-40 minutes until the topping is golden brown and the apples are tender.
8. Serve warm, optionally with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

entries.title: Banana Bread
entries.description: Moist and flavorful banana bread with a hint of cinnamon
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 3 ripe bananas, mashed
- 1/2 cup butter, melted
- 1 cup sugar
- 1 egg
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
- 1 teaspoon baking soda
- 1 1/2 cups flour
- 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
2. In a large bowl, mix the mashed bananas and melted butter.
3. Stir in the sugar, egg, and vanilla extract.
4. Sprinkle the baking soda and cinnamon over the mixture, then stir in the flour until just combined.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan.
6. Bake for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Let the banana bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

entries.title: Caesar Salad
entries.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 head romaine lettuce, chopped
- 1/2 cup Caesar dressing
- 1/2 cup croutons
- 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, toss the chopped romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
2. Add the croutons and Parmesan cheese, and toss again until evenly coated.
3. Sprinkle with black pepper.
4. Serve immediately.

entries.title: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
entries.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a bun
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 chicken breast
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 hamburger bun
- 1 leaf lettuce
- 2 slices tomato
- 1 tablespoon mayonnaise

Instructions:
1. Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium heat.
2. Rub the chicken breast with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
3. Grill the chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked.
4. Toast the hamburger bun on the grill for 1-2 minutes.
5. Assemble the sandwich by spreading mayonnaise on the bun, then adding the grilled chicken, lettuce, and tomato.
6. Serve immediately.

entries.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
entries.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 200g spaghetti
- 100g pancetta, diced
- 2 eggs
- 50g grated Parmesan cheese
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
2. In a large skillet, cook the pancetta until crispy, then add the minced garlic.
3. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and grated Parmesan cheese.
4. Drain the spaghetti, reserving some pasta water, and add it to the skillet with pancetta.
5. Remove the skillet from heat, then quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, tossing until the spaghetti is coated and creamy. Add a splash of pasta water if needed.
6. Season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.

entries.title: Beef Tacos
entries.description: Ground beef seasoned with taco spices, served in soft tortillas with toppings
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb ground beef
- 1 packet taco seasoning
- 8 soft tortillas
- 1 cup shredded lettuce
- 1/2 cup diced tomatoes
- 1/2 cup shredded cheese
- 1/4 cup sour cream

Instructions:
1. In a skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned. Drain any excess fat.
2. Add the taco seasoning to the beef according to the package instructions.
3. Warm the soft tortillas in a skillet or microwave.
4. Assemble the tacos by filling each tortilla with seasoned beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream.
5. Serve immediately.

entries.title: French Toast
entries.description: Golden-brown slices of bread dipped in an egg mixture and pan-fried
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 4 slices of bread
- 2 eggs
- 1/2 cup milk
- 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
- Butter for frying
- Maple syrup and powdered sugar for serving

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla extract.
2. Heat a skillet over medium heat and add a small amount of butter.
3. Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides.
4. Place the bread in the skillet and cook until golden brown on both sides.
5. Serve with maple syrup and a dusting of powdered sugar.

entries.title: Pancakes with Maple Syrup
entries.description: Fluffy pancakes served with butter and maple syrup
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 cup flour
- 1 tablespoon sugar
- 1 teaspoon baking powder
- 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup milk
- 1 egg
- 2 tablespoons melted butter
- Butter and maple syrup for serving

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
2. In another bowl, mix the milk, egg, and melted butter.
3. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
4. Heat a skillet over medium heat and grease it with butter.
5. Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake and cook until bubbles form on the surface.
6. Flip and cook the other side until golden brown.
7. Serve with butter and maple syrup.

entries.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
entries.description: Stir-fried chicken with vegetables in a savory sauce
entries.text:
Ingredients:
- 1 lb chicken breast, sliced thin
- 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots)
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon hoisin sauce
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 1 teaspoon garlic, minced
- Cooked rice for serving

Instructions:
1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the sesame oil over medium-high heat.
2. Add the chicken and stir-fry until browned and cooked through.
3. Add the minced garlic and mixed vegetables, stir-frying for 3-4 minutes.
4. Stir in the soy sauce and hoisin sauce, coating the chicken and vegetables.
5. Serve over cooked rice.
